mapper.select:
select
from game_activity_rotor_statistics order by gars_create_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_activity_rotor_statistics ( gars_id , gars_date , gars_player_num , gars_tatol_count , gars_recycled_gold , gars_week_num , gars_month_num , gars_diamond5_num , gars_diamond8_num , gars_gold2000_num , gars_gold5000_num , gars_gold1w_num , gars_gold5w_num , gars_gold10w_num , gars_gold50w_num , gars_gold300w_num , gars_gold1000w_num , gars_create_time ) VALUES ( #{garsId, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{garsPlayerNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{garsTatolCount, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{garsRecycledGold, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsWeekNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{garsMonthNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{garsDiamond5Num, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{garsDiamond8Num, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{garsGold2000Num, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsGold5000Num, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsGold1wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsGold5wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsGold10wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsGold50wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsGold300wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsGold1000wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{garsCreateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE game_activity_rotor_statistics
gars_date = #{garsDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
gars_player_num = #{garsPlayerNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
gars_tatol_count = #{garsTatolCount, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
gars_recycled_gold = #{garsRecycledGold, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_week_num = #{garsWeekNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
gars_month_num = #{garsMonthNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
gars_diamond5_num = #{garsDiamond5Num, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
gars_diamond8_num = #{garsDiamond8Num, jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
gars_gold2000_num = #{garsGold2000Num, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_gold5000_num = #{garsGold5000Num, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_gold1w_num = #{garsGold1wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_gold5w_num = #{garsGold5wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_gold10w_num = #{garsGold10wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_gold50w_num = #{garsGold50wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_gold300w_num = #{garsGold300wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_gold1000w_num = #{garsGold1000wNum, jdbcType=BIGINT} ,
gars_create_time = #{garsCreateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
WHERE gars_id = #{garsId}
